li.label: Chemfuel
li.tooltip: "Use acid to burn the victim's face. Chemfuel is flammable and volatile, but has an amazingly low pH. Its further lowering by relatively simple means gives it exceptionally strong corrosive properties (albeit at the cost of flammability). This is why boomalopes are so sour when you fail to tame them."
